long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Whopper Clicker" is a  magical game, a click game where players need to click on the screen to complete specific tasks or achieve goals. These types of games are usually very interesting and time-consuming, as players need to constantly click to get progress and rewards. In Whopper Clicker, where delicious  burgers and endless clicking fun await! In this captivating game, you'll purchase a variety of burgers through continuous clicks, experience the joy of stacking tasty treats, and build your burger kingdom.

üçî Game Features:
Click to Stack Burgers: Embark on a delicious journey by diving into our burger-clicking adventure! Click on the enticing hamburger to earn more Whopper Coins and unlock a variety of burger layers. Start with the classic single patty, progress to the indulgent double patty, and strive towards the ultimate Burger King masterpiece. Savor the thrill of stacking up your burger layers as you collect Whopper Coins to conquer each tasty milestone!

üçîHow to Play?
Click the Whopper. Use whoppers to purchase more clicking tools in the shop. Get the most amount of whoppers by clicking.

Are you ready to start clicking and purchasing a variety of burgers in Whopper Clicker? Unleash your creativity, and build your burger kingdom one mouth-watering bite at a time. Get clicking, start stacking, and create a delicious burger empire that will leave everyone craving more!

Extension Button Menu
*Play more games and explore exciting themes on the page menu buttons.
